name: Sector 4096
description:
Sector 4096 is a 3D stealth horror game in 64x64 resolution made for LOWREZJAM 2022 in 2 weeks.

Escape the sector by finding keycards to unlock doors while avoiding whatever is in there with you.

Sound is important to play this game effectively.

** PLEASE NOTE YOU MUST PLAY IN FULLSCREEN. I'M UNSURE WHY BUT MOUSE LOOK DOESN'T WORK CORRECTLY IF YOU DON'T AND I DON'T HAVE TIME TO TRY AND FIX NOW. **

You may also need to click again once in game to recapture the mouse.

CONTROLS

WASD to move

C to toggle crouch/sneak

Mouse to look

LMB to interact

ADDITIONAL CONTROLS

P to pause/unpause

F to go fullscreen

, to reduce mouse sensitivity

. to increase mouse sensitivity
